TEXT.TITLE: HYPONEX <HYPX> DEBT DOWNGRADED BY S/P
TEXT.BODY: Standard and Poor's Corp said it downgraded to CCC-plus from B-minus Hyponex Corp's 30 mln dlrs of subordinated debt. It assigned a CCC-plus rating to Hyponex's 150 mln dlrs of senior subordinated debentures due 1999 that were priced Wednesday for offering. The implied senior debt rating is B. S and P cited an increase in debt leverage to 86 pct of capitalization from 56 pct. While the company's operating record has been successful, S and P said the action also reflected uncertainties and risks associated with management's new business and investment strategies. Reuter
